name.baseName: Woolen tea, silkworm cocoon (roasted cocoon) ; Liquefied petroleum gas ; Stove burning ; All sizes; NESPS2
毛茶、蚕茧（烤茧） ; 液化石油气 ; 炉灶燃烧 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
technology.technologicalApplicability: 本数据集描述了使用液化石油气（LPG）炉灶燃烧毛茶和蚕茧（包括烤茧）的工艺，适用于所有规模的炉灶。末端污染管理技术旨在捕获从 PM2.5 到 PM10 范围内的颗粒物，以及二氧化硫（SO2）和氮氧化物（NOx）。此设置可能典型应用于纺织品加工或蚕业产品处理业务，在其中污染控制至关重要。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码05,四级代码0514文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)is/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
源文件中描述为为液化石油气，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
源文件中描述为为液化石油气，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物

Pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe management technology is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator for sulfur dioxide, here it is matched to the LCAflow library to match the most compatible flow, the pollutant indicator remarks for sulfur dioxide, the production coefficient remarks for sulfur dioxide production coefficient in the form of liquefied petroleum gas sulfur content (S), where S is the full sulfur content of liquefied petroleum gas (S), where S is the full sulfur content of liquefied petroleum gas (S). Where S is the full sulfur content of liquefied petroleum gas. When the sulfur content of LPG is 1.25%, the value of S in the production coefficient table is 1.25 The production coefficient described in the original article is 20 S. Please modify the corresponding emission rate after calculating according to the remarks.

污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫，产污系数备注为二氧化硫产污系数以液化石油气含硫量(S)形式表示，其中S是液化石油气的全硫分含量。当液化石油气的含硫量为1.25%时，产污系数表中S取值1.25原文描述的产污系数为 20S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。
